bibl.title: Did Athene Help Tydeus to Win the Cadmean Games (Iliad 5.808)?
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Il. 5.808 in its context. - 3. The external evidence: scholia, MSS., papyri [in part. P. Vindob. Inv. 26761 (= Pack2 755)]. - 4. The internal evidence. - 5. Conclusion.
